slides.title: Sculpting Electrifying Sound
slides.description: As one of India's leading OEMs for electric guitars and stringed instruments, we consistently elevate musical experiences with exceptional craftsmanship.

slides.title: Striking the perfect chord
slides.description: Echoing Precision & Passion Across the Globe: With nearly three decades of dedication, HMI tunes every detail to craft instruments of excellence.

slides.title: Designing Perfection with
slides.description: Located in the vibrant port city of Chennai, South India, our advanced infrastructure delivers world-class stringed instruments to customers worldwide.

slides.title: Our Legacy Continues -
slides.description: Since 2001, we've showcased our craftsmanship at NAMM. Join us in 2025 as we continue our legacy of excellence in musical instruments!
